newsitem.title: USA: U.S. barge rates -Quoted flat to lower, trade thin.
newsitem.headline: U.S. barge rates -Quoted flat to lower, trade thin.

text.p: U.S. barge rates were thinly quoted at steady to lower levels on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session. Four barges traded versus none Monday.
- Four barges, Illinois River, one each week of October, traded at 220 percent of tariff.
- One barge, St Paul-Savage, Upper Mississippi River, this week, no bid, offer 150 percent, no comparison.
- Five barges, Mid-Mississippi, one each week of June, no bid, offer 115 percent, down 2-1/2 percentage points, similar from Monday.
- Five barges, Illinois River, one each week of June, no bid, offer 105 percent, no comparison.
- Eight barges, Mid-Mississippi River, two each week of September, bid one barge each at 155 percent, offer 162-1/2 percent, no comparison.
